text: Elena Undone is a 2010 lesbian romantic drama movie. The title character is the wife of a pastor. She has strong feelings for another woman. She later divorces the pastor and falls in love with a woman named Peyton. This movie got mixed reviews. It is rated 58% by Rotten Tomatoes. == Other websites == * Category:2010 LGBT movies Category:2010 romantic drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies
title: Elena Undone
